member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PropertyPopulator.Populator.ParseValue(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the given string as one of the standard value types: bool, decimal, sbyte, byte, short, ushort, int, uint, long, ulong, char, float, or double. Simply returns val on failure.
member.param: The string containing the value to be parsed.
The target type of val after parsing.
member.returns: A new object representing the string val parsed as the appropriate type or val if type is not one of the standard value types.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PropertyPopulator.Populator.ParseCustomValue(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Extendeds types that ParseValue can parse
member.returns: The parsed value, or null indicating that this type was not parsable by this method
